data.name: DevOps Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's DevOps Center of Excellence focuses on standardizing DevOps and DevSecOps practices to deliver consistent, secure, and scalable deployments. The CoE provides comprehensive services including CI/CD automation, infrastructure as code, containerization, configuration management, and AI/ML-enhanced DevOps capabilities. With 75+ skilled DevOps professionals and 400+ cloud-native engineers, the CoE enables organizations to achieve faster releases, streamlined deployments, and improved development velocity through end-to-end automation and modern DevOps practices.

data.businessValue: Accion's DevOps CoE delivers significant business value through accelerated deployment times (from weeks to hours), streamlined development workflows (40-60% faster delivery cycles), enhanced security posture with integrated DevSecOps practices, and substantial operational efficiency gains (30-50% reduction in manual tasks). The CoE enables organizations to achieve faster time-to-market, improved development velocity, enhanced collaboration between teams, better resource utilization, and increased developer productivity through automation, standardization, and modern DevOps practices.
